titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to prevent the Thrift Savings Fund from investing in any company that boycotts Israel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 6/4/2015--Introduced. This bill prohibits the investment of any Thrift Savings Account funds in any company that boycotts Israel.
